events.message: I was involved in a car collision on the highway yesterday, and I need to file a claim immediately due to the damage sustained.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the incident report and initial description of the vehicle damage.
An agent from the claims department has been assigned to handle your case related to the recent car accident.
We have acknowledged your auto accident claim and will begin processing it promptly to assist you as soon as possible.
Please provide the accident report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents including accident report and photos of the collision damage were submitted successfully.
The investigation into the circumstances surrounding your vehicle accident has begun to verify all provided information.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed with all facts and documents reviewed.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover repairs and damages to your vehicle following the collision.
You provided positive feedback regarding the quick response and thorough handling of your auto accident claim.
Your auto accident insurance claim has been approved for the proposed settlement based on investigation findings.
The approved payment for your vehicle damage after the collision has been issued and should reflect in your account shortly.
Your auto accident claim case has been successfully closed following payment and resolution of all issues.
